properties.name: Better Foliage
properties.description:
Better Foliage is a Forge mod that will make your Minecraft worlds more impressive, mainly by improving how vegetation looks.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/better-foliage

properties.name: Journey Map
properties.description:
JourneyMap is a client+server mod for Forge which maps your Minecraft world in real-time as you explore.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/journeymap

properties.name: Dynamic Surroundings
properties.description:
Dynamic Surroundings is a mod much like Matmos that adds enviornmental sounds to your game.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dynamic-surroundings

properties.name: Tabby Chat
properties.description:
TabbyChat is a client-side mod for Minecraft that aims to make the multiplayer chat interface more organized, managable, and user-friendly.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tabbychat-2

properties.name: WorldEdit CUI
properties.description:
This mod provides a client-side user interface for the WorldEdit plugin allowing you to see your selected region in-game in real time.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/worldeditcui-forge-edition-2

properties.name: QuickHotBar
properties.description:
Adds extra hot bars on top of your existing hot bar.

https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/quick-hotbar

properties.name: Sound Physics
properties.description:
Like Matmos, adds sound physics to your game.

https://github.com/djpadbit/Sound-Physics

properties.name: Camera
properties.description:
A camera mod that lets you change time, weather, and move freely around your character.

https://github.com/ArdaCraft/Camera
